description: Region of British Columbia where the survey was performed. Calvert Island or Quadra Island
Date on which the survey was conducted
Rocky intertidal site where survey was conducted
The individual(s) who conducted the survey
The time (24hr clock) when the survey was begun
The time (24hr clock) when the survey was completed
The tide height at the time the survey was started
The effective tide height at the time the survey was started (due to swell and wind)
Taxonomic name for a given taxon code
Common vernacular description of what a given code represents (i.e. acorn barnacle, dead acorn barnacle)
Life stage category for observed Pisaster ochraceous
Category reflecting healthiness or stage of wasting disease
Size category of radius (sea stars), total length (abalone & Cryptochiton stelleri), or test width (sea urchins)
The number of individuals of a given size category in the swath
The individual(s) who entered the data into the spreadsheet
The individual(s) who quality controlled the data
Records anything of note about a given observation
